size to obtain gauge stitch markers 1 removable 1 ring stitch holder or waste yarn gauge 14 stitches and 18 rounds = 4 in stockinette note to ensure a successful project check gauge change needle size as necessary notes be sure to check gauge some bulky and some super-bulky yarns will work for this project there are many helpful online tutorials for backward loop cast-on and make one increases abbreviations k knit k2tog knit two together knit two stitches together as if one one stitch decreased m1l make one left pick up the bar between two stitches with left hand needle bringing the needle tip from the front to the back then knit into the back of this stitch m1r make one right pick up the bar between two stitches with left hand needle bringing the needle from the back to the front then knit into the front of this stitch p purl ssk slip slip knit slip one stitch as if to knit and slip next stitch as if to purl to right hand needle insert left hand needle in front of the two stitches and knit them together as if one one stitch decreased st s stitch es this pattern/design is the property of the author/designer it may not be reproduced without permission instructions mitten make 2 begin cuff with yarn and double pointed needles cast on 24 28 32 stitches and join without twisting to work in the round place removable marker on the first stitch worked to mark the beginning of the round move marker up on the fabric of the mitten as necessary to track the beginning of the round 1 x 1 ribbing round *k1 p1 repeat from * to end work 1 x 1 ribbing round 10 10 12 times total knit 3 5 5 rounds set up round k2 place marker knit to end increase for thumb gusset as follows first round m1r knit to marker m1l slip marker knit to end 2 sts increased second round knit to marker slip marker knit to end repeat these two rounds one two three time s more for two three four times total 4 6 8 sts increased 6 8 10 sts before marker 28 34 40 sts reserve thumb stitches next round slip 6 8 10 stitches to holder or scrap yarn and with working yarn cast on 2 stitches to right hand needle using backward loop cast-on remove marker knit to end 24 28 32 sts work hand knit every round for
